benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/customFields/search - Search custom fields by type, name and optional value

covered: Valid Request: Multiple test cases validate retrieval with no params and with valid objectType, fieldName, and fieldValue combinations; responses are 200 and data conforms to CustomField schema.
Empty Response: TC28 validates 200 with empty array when database has no custom fields.
Pagination: TC07, TC21, TC22 cover offset/limit handling and large datasets, including boundary conditions.
Query Parameters: Comprehensive coverage of objectType, fieldName, fieldValue and combined filters; extra param is ignored (TC12); partial input (TC37).
Authorization: TC17 verifies 401 on missing authentication.
Audit integration: TC08-10 cover FULL/MINIMAL/NONE audit modes; TC18 tests audit service unavailability; TC32 and TC33 verify data consistency and degraded behavior.
Security: TC19 and TC20 test SQL injection in fieldName and XSS in fieldValue.
Regression: TC25 and TC26 verify fixes for fieldName filtering and FULL audit correctness.
State variation and reliability: TC27 backward compatibility; TC28 empty DB; TC29 partially populated DB; TC36 recovery from transient network failure.
Performance: TC30 and TC31 measure response times under normal and peak load.
Accessibility: TC34-35 ensure API documentation availability and descriptive errors.
Integration and data correctness: TC01 TC05 TC06 verify correct filtering results and schema conformance; TC32/TC33 ensure audit data matches audit logs.
gaps: Rate limiting: No tests validating API behavior under burst or throttling.
Caching behavior: No tests validating response caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) or 304 responses.
Add an explicit 403 Forbidden test for insufficient permissions (currently only 401 is tested).
Non-numeric offset/limit values tests (e.g., offset=abc, limit=abc) to validate error handling.
500 Internal Server Error scenario for database failure during GET.
Additional fieldValue filter: Add injection scenario in fieldValue as well (e.g., fieldValue=... ) to broaden security coverage.
Pagination across multi-page results with non-trivial ordering and duplicates (optional).
Edge-case: more robust cross-service integration checks beyond audit logs (possible).
recommendations: Add tests for rate limiting to verify throttling behavior and error handling under bursts.
Add tests for caching headers such as ETag and Cache-Control and 304 responses when data is unchanged.
Add an explicit 403 Forbidden test to cover insufficient permissions scenarios.
Add tests for non-numeric offset/limit inputs (e.g., offset=abc, limit=abc) to ensure proper error handling.
Introduce tests simulating 500 Internal Server Error during GET to validate server error handling.
Expand security testing to include fieldValue injection scenarios alongside fieldName.
Enhance pagination coverage with multi-page navigation and edge-case ordering on large datasets.
Consider additional cross-service integration checks for other dependent services if applicable.
